```{r}
setwd("C:/Users/User/Documents/GitHub/cs243")
data = read.csv("Caleb-243-SummaryLatest.csv")

for (dType in list("int", "float", "long", "char")){
  par(mfrow=c(2,3))
  for (test in list("Sum", "Multiply")){
    for (platform in list("ASUS Laptop", "Raspberry Pi", "Mac")){
      currentData = data[data$Machine == platform & data$DataType == dType & data$Operation == test, ]
      BufferSize = currentData$Buffer.Size
      OpsPerTime = currentData$Ops.T.Mean
      plot(BufferSize, OpsPerTime, main=paste(platform, ", ", dType, test), type="o")
      lines(BufferSize, currentData$Ops.T.Std, main=paste(platform, ", ", dType, test), type="o", col="red")
      lines(BufferSize, currentData$Ops.T.Dev, main=paste(platform, ", ", dType, test), type="o", col="blue")
    }
  }
}
```
